name: Introduction to Pharmacology and Pharmacokinetic Principles
description: A general introduction to the principles of pharmacology and pharmacokinetics. Topics include chemical (drug) absorption, distribution, biotransformation, elimination; the calculation of dosages and pharmacokinetic parameters, variability in drug response, adverse drug reactions and special interest topics.

instructors: C Woodland M Arnot D Riddick
M Arnot C Woodland D Riddick
